summary:
An energetic C-Level Executive, Development Specialist, Marketing Strategist and Product Innovator with strong entrepreneurial approach to business. Exposed to the Middle East and Far East markets since 1995. Has lived and worked in 15, mostly middle eastern countries and is experienced in achieving excellent results across different cultures and languages. Back in Europe since 2020 and ready to inspire teams to achieve excellence with a passion for quality.

Other Skills:
Multi Unit (Hotel) Operations Management
Hotel Management Contract Negotiation
Marketing Communications
Brand & Retail Identity Development
Revenue & Distribution Management

We are essentially a “think tank”, developing visionary concepts and strategies for only four sectors: Property, Hospitality, Food & Beverage and Retail.  After spending decades at the most senior levels with mega property developers and global hotel power players, we took that expertise and are using it to craft concepts and strategies that are informed, thoughtful and differentiated, borne out of our years of insider experience.
 
When engaged on Property Masterplans, we plug in as an external Marketing team where we provide input into the overall master plan, develop a go-to-market strategy, provide input/guidance/training of the Marketing department and assist with recruitment.  We have worked on Dubai’s most iconic projects in our previous roles, as well as across geographies from London to Kazakhstan, on a wide range of mixed-use developments.
 
When engaged on Hotels and F&B, we create and develop full A to Z concepts, incorporating every aspect of the business model – from its positioning to the design style of each of its spaces; to the kind of service and staff culture it imbues, services and amenities offered, the menu its chefs and bars prepare, the brand, uniforms, photography… This kind of commitment, the crafting of each single touchpoint, allows us to develop hotels and restaurants that are compelling and have longevity in the market.  We can also provide a full analysis of existing hotels and restaurants in order to improve profitability and brand equity.
 
When engaged on Retail we work on mixed use retail developments or masterplans to strategically develop a concept, retail mix, strategy and brand that is competitive in increasingly crowded retail marketplaces.', 'title': 'Head of Hospitality Development', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 3046790, 'name': 'The Domain Bahrain - boutique hotel & spa', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQH6Uyxug7gP3w/company-logo_400_400/0/1643279951716?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=GGJeeNUf-ZY908caN01vrrTEl8iXe9cRnVoSsHlpHXk', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/the-domain-bahrain/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Manama', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'The Domain Hotel And Spa', 'description': 'The Domain Bahrain is an innovative “hotel-club concept” designed to offer a socially charged members club with the added benefit of hotel rooms. The concept’s inaugural project is a 36-story, 130-key property in Manama’s Diplomatic District focuses on sociability, entertainment and technology. Modernist and social, The Domain’s slogan “Stay Work Play” represents the blur between business and leisure in the guests’ lives. 

The emphasis on social spaces is highlighted by the quirky, reverse-mix of the hotel-club’s dining and entertainment outlets outweighing the rooms and suites offering. Facilities at The Domain Bahrain include Vie Lifestyle Lab, 375m² of meeting space and nine restaurants and lounges including skylounge "Txoko", grill room "Le Sauvage", South of France restaurant "Le Domain [34]", as well as IMARI, a contemporary Japanese restaurant, lounge and bar on the 35th floor.

A team of Domain Managers and Butlers make sure that every aspect of the guest’s stay is handled with grace and efficiency. Domain members will benefit from a range of unique services, including invitations to highly engaging events and social gatherings.

With a team of international hoteliers behind the project, The Domain looks to expand on the traditional hospitality model by taking the groundbreaking hotel-club concept into vibrant cities around the world.', 'title': 'Managing Director', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'DutchKid FZCO', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'company': 'DutchKid FZCO', 'description': 'DutchKid FZCO is successful, Dubai-grown wholesale business, distributing a 35+brand portfolio of high-end quality baby products in the Middle East region.
